sections.heading: improvements; damages; immunity
sections.text: Neither the county, the county board, nor the individual members thereof shall be liable for damages to or loss sustained by any lot or land owner by reason of their actions in the administration of sections 31-901 to 31-933 or for failure to function hereunder.Source

31-929.Drainage improvements; damages; immunity.

Neither the county, the county board, nor the individual members thereof shall be liable for damages to or loss sustained by any lot or land owner by reason of their actions in the administration of sections 31-901 to 31-933 or for failure to function hereunder.

SourceLaws 1959, c. 132, ยง 29, p. 493.
